arts.ttl: Europa League: Twente blow lead in Nice
arts.sum: FC Twente threw away a 2-0 lead as they drew 2-2 at OGC Nice in the Europa League. Twente had drawn two and lost one of their three games going into the clash in France which meant they needed to pick up a victory to put them into the playoff spots. It started perfectly for […] The post Europa League: Twente blow lead in Nice appeared first on Football Oranje.
